javadoc: This class parses the meta-data about a script.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: provider
params.comment: the script provider (for example, java or python)

methods.javadoc: Setting the toolbar image to null forces it to be reloaded on the next request.
methods.name: refresh
methods.comment: Setting the toolbar image to null forces it to be reloaded on the next request.

methods.name: getName
methods.comment:
Returns the name of the script.
 The name of the script is the file name.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script source file.
@return the script source file
methods.name: getSourceFile

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script author information.
@return the script author information.
methods.name: getAuthor

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if the script has compile errors.
@return true if the script has compile errors
methods.name: isCompileErrors
methods.comment: Returns true if the script has compile errors.

return.comment: true if the script has compile errors

methods.javadoc:
Sets whether the script has compile errors.
@param b true if the script has compile errors
methods.name: setCompileErrors
methods.comment: Sets whether the script has compile errors.

params.name: b
params.comment: true if the script has compile errors

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this script is a duplicate.
 When two or more scripts exists with the same name, this
 is considered a duplicate script.
@return true if this script is a duplicate
methods.name: isDuplicate
methods.comment:
Returns true if this script is a duplicate.
 When two or more scripts exists with the same name, this
 is considered a duplicate script.

return.comment: true if this script is a duplicate

methods.javadoc:
Sets whether the script is a duplicate.
@param isDuplicate true if the script is a duplicate
methods.name: setDuplicate
methods.comment: Sets whether the script is a duplicate.

params.name: isDuplicate
params.comment: true if the script is a duplicate

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script description.
@return the script description
methods.name: getDescription
isCategory
methods.comment: Returns true if 'cat' is a category.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script category path.
@return the script category path
methods.name: getCategory

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script menu path.
@return the script menu path
methods.name: getMenuPath
getMenuPathAsString
methods.comment:
Returns the script menu path as a string.
 For example, "Path1-Path2-Path3".

return.comment: the script menu path as a string

methods.javadoc:
Returns the script key binding.
@return the script key binding
methods.name: getKeyBinding
getToolBarImage
methods.comment: Returns the script tool bar icon.

params.name: scaled
params.comment: true if the icon should be scaled to 16x16.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a string designed to be used as a tool tip for describing this script
@return a string designed to be used as a tool tip
methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.comment: Returns a string designed to be used as a tool tip for describing this script

return.comment: a string designed to be used as a tool tip

name: ScriptInfo
comment: This class parses the meta-data about a script.

fields.javadoc: The delimiter used to categories and menu paths.
fields.name: DELIMITTER
fields.comment: The delimiter used to categories and menu paths.
